verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:34
verses.text: And Saul said, Disperse yourselves among the people, and say unto them, Bring me hither every man his ox, and every man his sheep, and slay them here, and eat; and sin not against the Lord in eating with the blood. And all the people brought every man his ox with him that night, and slew them there.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:35
verses.text: And Saul built an altar unto the Lord: the same was the first altar that he built unto the Lord.
